content: Continue on the path to the left (running alongside the wall) to pick up the Fire Date from the tree on the right and take out the Bull Stalwart.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rakshasa Palace'.
The content is as follows:
Continue on the path to the left (running alongside the wall) to pick up the Fire Date from the tree on the right and take out the Bull Stalwart.
